targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("bytes-loaded"), 1s) AS "bytes_loaded" FROM "nom-data-loader.loader.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /$hostname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name", "key" fill(null)

SELECT SUM(bytes) AS total_bytes_loaded FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("bytes-loaded"), 1s) AS bytes FROM "nom-data-loader.loader.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /$hostname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), "host-name","key" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s)

select mean(total_bytes_loaded) as "1h_mean" from (SELECT SUM(bytes) AS total_bytes_loaded FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("bytes-loaded"), 1s) AS bytes FROM "nom-data-loader.loader.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /$hostname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), "host-name","key" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s)) where $timeFilter group by time(1h) fill(null)

select mean(total_bytes_loaded) as "10m_mean" from (SELECT SUM(bytes) AS total_bytes_loaded FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("bytes-loaded"), 1s) AS bytes FROM "nom-data-loader.loader.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /$hostname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), "host-name","key" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s)) where $timeFilter group by time(10m) fill(null)

select sum(rps) as total_rps from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("rows-loaded"), 1s) AS "rps" FROM "nom-data-loader.loader.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /$hostname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), "host-name","key") where $timeFilter group by time(60s) fill(null)

select mean(rps) as "1h_mean" from (select sum(rps) as "rps" from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("rows-loaded"), 1s) AS "rps" FROM "nom-data-loader.loader.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /$hostname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), "host-name","key") where $timeFilter group by time(60s) fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time(1h) fill(null)

select mean(rps) as "10m_mean" from (select sum(rps) as "rps" from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("rows-loaded"), 1s) AS "rps" FROM "nom-data-loader.loader.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /$hostname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s), "host-name","key") where $timeFilter group by time(60s) fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time(10m) fill(null)
SELECT max("ros-used-bytes") / (1024*1024) as mb_used FROM "nom-data-loader.vertica.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter AND "host-name" =~ /$hostname/ GROUP BY time($interval), "vertica-node-id" fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") + mean("usage_system") as cores FROM "cpu" WHERE  "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("bytes-loaded") FROM "nom-data-loader.loader.copy-complete" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("time-statistics.records-processed"), 1s) AS "qps" FROM "nom-link.transform.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /engdb/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

select MEAN(total_qps) as "10m_mean" from (SELECT SUM(qps) AS total_qps FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("time-statistics.records-processed"), 1s) AS "qps" FROM "nom-link.transform.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /engdb/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)

select mean(qps) as "60s_mean" from (select sum(qps) as "qps" from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tovertica-statistics.records-sent"), 1s) AS "qps" FROM "nom-link.transform.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /$hostname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time(10s) fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time(60s) fill(null)

select mean(qps) as "1h_mean" from (select sum(qps) as "qps" from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tovertica-statistics.records-sent"), 1s) AS "qps" FROM "nom-link.transform.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /$hostname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time(10s) fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time(1h) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("messages-processed"), 1s) FROM "nom-data-loader.loader.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /$hostname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name", "key" fill(null)

SELECT SUM(total) AS "total" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("messages-processed"), 1s) AS "total" FROM "nom-data-loader.loader.statistics" WHERE "host-name" =~ /$hostname/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name", "key" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(60s)

select max(event) AS "fault-tolerance-critical" from (select non_negative_derivative(min("monitoring-events.fault-tolerance-critical"), 30s) as event from "nom-data-loader.vertica.statistics" where $timeFilter and "cluster-id" != "" group by time(30s), "vertica-node-id", "cluster-id") WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

select max(event) AS "loss-of-k-safety" from (select non_negative_derivative(min("monitoring-events.loss-of-k-safety"), 30s) as event from "nom-data-loader.vertica.statistics" where $timeFilter and "cluster-id" != "" group by time(30s), "vertica-node-id", "cluster-id") WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

select max(event) AS "too-many-ros-containers" from (select non_negative_derivative(min("monitoring-events.too-many-ros-containers"), 30s) as event from "nom-data-loader.vertica.statistics" where $timeFilter and "cluster-id" != "" group by time(30s), "vertica-node-id", "cluster-id") WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

select max(event) AS "node-state-change" from (select non_negative_derivative(min("monitoring-events.node-state-change"), 30s) as event from "nom-data-loader.vertica.statistics" where $timeFilter and "cluster-id" != "" group by time(30s), "vertica-node-id", "cluster-id") WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
